alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 10 at 6:41AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Including the following area, Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers and low-lying and flood-prone locations including the Hula Hula River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Significant rainfall Friday night and Saturday in the Northeast Brooks Range has caused rises in rivers draining north to the Arctic Ocean. This may cause flooding along rivers today. It is expected that the high water will move down river to the coast today, and that rivers will start to fall tonight. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
